page.title: Welcome to AngoraSix Team Beta
page.description: Thank you for joining our team-focused beta program. Get ready to transform how your team collaborates.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Team!
welcome.subtitle: You're now part of our exclusive beta program for entrepreneurial teams.

beta.title: Join Our Team Beta Program
beta.description: Get early access to team collaboration features, multi-signature wallets, and contribution tracking designed specifically for entrepreneurial teams.
beta.success: You're in! We'll contact you soon with beta access.

feedback.title: Share Your Vision
feedback.description: Tell us about your team's biggest collaboration challenges. Your input shapes our development.
feedback.placeholder: What's your team's biggest challenge when working together?

resources.title: Team Resources
resources.description: Prepare your team for the beta launch with our guides and best practices.
